original_text: Then Paul said, ‘John baptized people who knew that they had done wrong things. They wanted to stop doing these things. But John also said to the people, “You must believe in the man who will come soon.” This person is Jesus.’
korean_text: 바울이 이르되 요한이 회개의 세례를 베풀며 백성에게 말하되 내 뒤에 오시는 이를 믿으라 하였으니 이는 곧 예수라 하거늘

sentences.original_text: who knew that they had done wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 잘못된 것들을 했다는 것을 아는

sentences.original_text: They wanted to stop doing these things
But John also said to the people
You must believe in the man
